mapper.sql: SUBCONTRACT_ID, SUBCONTRACT_NUM, SUBCONTRACT_MANUAL_NUM, SUBCONTRACT_TYPE, SUBCONTRACT_STATUS, IF_TOP_SUBCON, SIGN_DATE, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, SUBCONTRACT_AMT, USER_NUM, ORG_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PARTY_ID, BZ, ZGBJXE, JGGZRBLDJ, ZFWYJBL, CHANGE_PERCENT, JRNCRBZJ, BZJJE, BZJBL, BZJLX, AYLLJX, ANLLJX, JRTZKH, AVI_AMT, TOTAL_AMT, PAPER_CON_NUM, BZJJXZQ, CON_PARTY_ID, IF_DATA_MOVE, QTJSXFS, PROGUARANTY_WAY, PROGUARANTY_TYPE, PROGUARANTY_FORM, SUB_SCOPE, DB_RATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT V.PARTY_ID partyId, V.PARTY_NAME partyName, A.PRODUCT_TYPE productType, a.currency_cd currencyCd, A.CONTRACT_NUM contractNum, C.SUBCONTRACT_NUM, a.con_yu_e conYuE, DECODE(C.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', B.SURETY_AMT, A.CONTRACT_AMT) subContractAmt, DECODE(C.IF_TOP_SUBCON,'1',c.zgbjxe-c.avi_amt,'0',a.CONTRACT_AMT,'0') subContractSum, DECODE(C.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', C.AVI_AMT, '0', '0') AVI_AMT, to_char(decode(c.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', c.BEGIN_DATE, a.BEGIN_DATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') as BEGIN_DATE, to_char(decode(c.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', c.END_DATE, a.END_DATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') as end_DATE FROM TB_CON_CONTRACT_INFO A, TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT_REL B, TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT C, TB_CON_SUB_GRT_REL D, TB_GRT_GUARANTEE_BASIC E, V_CSM_PARTY V WHERE A.CONTRACT_ID = B.CONTRACT_ID AND V.PARTY_ID = A.PARTY_ID AND B.SUBCONTRACT_ID = C.SUBCONTRACT_ID AND C.SUBCONTRACT_ID = D.SUBCONTRACT_ID AND D.SURETY_ID = E.SURETY_ID AND A.CON_STATUS = '03' and c.subcontract_status='03' AND E.PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT v.PARTY_ID partyId, V.PARTY_NAME partyName, tc.PRODUCT_TYPE productType, TC.CONTRACT_NUM contractNum, TS.SUBCONTRACT_NUM, DECODE(TS.IF_TOP_SUBCON,'1',TSR.SURETY_AMT,TC.Contract_Amt) SUBCONTRACT_AMT , DECODE(TS.IF_TOP_SUBCON,'1',ts.zgbjxe-ts.avi_amt,'0',TS.SUBCONTRACT_AMT,'0') subContractSum , TS.AVI_AMT, C.COLL_TYPE collType, C.SORT_TYPE sortType, tc.con_yu_e conYuE, tc.currency_cd currencyCd, TO_CHAR(DECODE(TS.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', TS.BEGIN_DATE, TC.BEGIN_DATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(DECODE(TS.IF_TOP_SUBCON, '1', TS.END_DATE, TC.END_DATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS END_DATE, (CASE C.MORTGAGE_STATUS WHEN '09' THEN '已入库' WHEN '04' THEN '已出库' ELSE '未入库' END) STATUS, TS.ZGBJXE FROM TB_CON_CONTRACT_INFO TC, TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT_REL TSR, TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT TS, V_CSM_PARTY V, TB_CON_SUB_GRT_REL F, TB_GRT_MORTGAGE_BASIC C WHERE TSR.CONTRACT_ID = TC.CONTRACT_ID AND TSR.SUBCONTRACT_ID = TS.SUBCONTRACT_ID AND TS.SUBCONTRACT_ID = F.SUBCONTRACT_ID AND F.SURETY_ID = C.SURETY_ID AND TS.CON_PARTY_ID = V.PARTY_ID AND C.COLL_TYPE IN ('01','02') and tc.con_status='03' and ts.subcontract_status = '03' AND TS.PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT (SUBCONTRACT_ID, SUBCONTRACT_NUM, SUBCONTRACT_MANUAL_NUM, SUBCONTRACT_TYPE, SUBCONTRACT_STATUS, IF_TOP_SUBCON, SIGN_DATE, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, SUBCONTRACT_AMT, USER_NUM, ORG_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PARTY_ID, BZ, ZGBJXE, JGGZRBLDJ, ZFWYJBL, CHANGE_PERCENT, JRNCRBZJ, BZJJE, BZJBL, BZJLX, AYLLJX, ANLLJX, JRTZKH, AVI_AMT, TOTAL_AMT, PAPER_CON_NUM, BZJJXZQ, CON_PARTY_ID, IF_DATA_MOVE, QTJSXFS, PROGUARANTY_WAY, PROGUARANTY_TYPE, PROGUARANTY_FORM, SUB_SCOPE, DB_RATE ) values (#{subcontractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcontractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcontractManualNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcontractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcontractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifTopSubcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subcontractAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zgbjxe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jggzrbldj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zfwyjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jrncrbzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bzjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bzjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bzjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aylljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anlljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jrtzkh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aviAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paperConNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzjjxzq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifDataMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qtjsxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proguarantyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proguarantyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proguarantyForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

update TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT
SUBCONTRACT_NUM = #{subcontractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBCONTRACT_MANUAL_NUM = #{subcontractManualNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBCONTRACT_TYPE = #{subcontractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBCONTRACT_STATUS = #{subcontractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_TOP_SUBCON = #{ifTopSubcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBCONTRACT_AMT = #{subcontractAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZGBJXE = #{zgbjxe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JGGZRBLDJ = #{jggzrbldj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZFWYJBL = #{zfwyjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_PERCENT = #{changePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JRNCRBZJ = #{jrncrbzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZJJE = #{bzjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZJBL = #{bzjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZJLX = #{bzjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AYLLJX = #{aylljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANLLJX = #{anlljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JRTZKH = #{jrtzkh,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AVI_AMT = #{aviAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMT = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAPER_CON_NUM = #{paperConNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZJJXZQ = #{bzjjxzq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CON_PARTY_ID = #{conPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_DATA_MOVE = #{ifDataMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTJSXFS = #{qtjsxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROGUARANTY_WAY = #{proguarantyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROGUARANTY_TYPE = #{proguarantyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROGUARANTY_FORM = #{proguarantyForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_SCOPE = #{subScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_RATE = #{dbRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SUBCONTRACT_ID = #{subcontractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_CON_SUBCONTRACT set SUBCONTRACT_NUM = #{subcontractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBCONTRACT_MANUAL_NUM = #{subcontractManualNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBCONTRACT_TYPE = #{subcontractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBCONTRACT_STATUS = #{subcontractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_TOP_SUBCON = #{ifTopSubcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBCONTRACT_AMT = #{subcontractAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZGBJXE = #{zgbjxe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JGGZRBLDJ = #{jggzrbldj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZFWYJBL = #{zfwyjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_PERCENT = #{changePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JRNCRBZJ = #{jrncrbzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZJJE = #{bzjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZJBL = #{bzjbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZJLX = #{bzjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AYLLJX = #{aylljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ANLLJX = #{anlljx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JRTZKH = #{jrtzkh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVI_AMT = #{aviAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMT = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAPER_CON_NUM = #{paperConNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZJJXZQ = #{bzjjxzq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CON_PARTY_ID = #{conPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IF_DATA_MOVE = #{ifDataMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTJSXFS = #{qtjsxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGUARANTY_WAY = #{proguarantyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGUARANTY_TYPE = #{proguarantyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGUARANTY_FORM = #{proguarantyForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_SCOPE = #{subScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_RATE = #{dbRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SUBCONTRACT_ID = #{subcontractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
